item.title: GTA V Online Stats Building Tips
item.description: How to Increase Your Character Stats in GTA Online Leveling up your character’s skills will make you more effective in various aspects of the game, from combat to maneuverability. Hereâ€™s a breakdown of how to improve each stat: ðŸ’ª Strength The Strength stat affects your melee damage, durability (reducing damage from falls and accidents), and your ability to climb ladders faster and perform better in sports like tennis and golf.
